thread.title: 17 Year Old E-Commerce Business - Drop Ship
thread.title_full: 17 Year Old E-Commerce Business - Drop Ship

title: 17 Year Old E-Commerce Business - Drop Ship
text: Questions Business Summary This is a drop-shipping online retail business selling customized religious products and is currently grossing approximately $330,000 per year. The business was established online in 1996 and has operated continuously and successfully since inception. Over 97% of the sales are in North America with the US taking the majority at 70% of sales. The websites rank extremely well on Google with page one rankings for most key words associated with the business. The business operates 3 web sites, 2 of which have been completely rebuilt in the last 24 months and are state of the art including online order processing and electronic payments. All orders are prepaid online or placed by toll free phone lines. This is an ideal opportunity for someone who wants to be their own boss with flexible hours and wishes to work from home. Daily operations include order processing, basic customer service and bookkeeping and the majority of work can be done in 4-5 hours per day. Financials
